title: La Verriere
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Opened Aug 2014, this vegetarian restaurant serves organic salads, juices, and vegan tarts and other daily changing options. Prepared by the owner (an osteopath) and his associate. A fridge case offers prepared food and bottled drinks for takeaway. Casual, has Wi-Fi. Metro station Ecole Militaire.
